data.title: Joan Helfrich Obituary in Pittsburgh at John F. Slater Funeral Home, Inc.
data.meta_description: Helfrich, Joan Theresa  (Sandroni, Meyer) Age 83, passed away peacefully on Friday, March 12, 2021 at Country Meadows in Bridgeville. Beloved  wife of 19 years to the late James L. Helfrich  and 31 years to the late Donald M. Meyer; loving mother to Donald G. Meyer, Denise Meyer Kennell (Max Stalter),  Darlene Meyer Giordano (Chad); grandmother of Garrett Kennell, Lexi Kennell, Morgan Giordano,  Madelyn Giordano; step mother to Robert Helfrich, Kathleen Helfrich Miller, Louis Helfrich (Sharon), David Helfrich (Kathleen); cherished twin sister to Rita (the late Renald) Tamburi, dear  sister of Mary Rose (John) Dobrzanski. Also survived by step grandchildren, step great grandchildren, nieces and nephews. If you couldn't get a hold of Joan, she was either playing BINGO or cheering on the Penguins.  Friends will be received at the John F. Slater Funeral Home, Inc. , 412-881-4100, 4201 Brownsville Road, Brentwood 15227, Monday, March 15 from 3-8 p. m. and  where a  Blessing service will be held on Tuesday, March 16 at 11:00 a. m.  Masks are required and social distancing guidelines must be adhered to. In lieu of flowers family suggests contributions to Country Meadows Co- Worker Foundation, www. countrymeadows. com or the  Alzheimer's Association, www. alz. org.

Also survived by step grandchildren, step great grandchildren, nieces and nephews. If you couldn't get a hold of Joan, she was either playing BINGO or cheering on the Penguins. Friends will be received at the John F. Slater Funeral Home, Inc., 412-881-4100, 4201 Brownsville Road, Brentwood 15227, Monday, March 15 from 3-8 p.m. and where a Blessing service will be held on Tuesday, March 16 at 11:00 a.m. Masks are required and social distancing guidelines must be adhered to.
